name: Hue Official Soundtrack
reviews:
“It is one of my favourite in-game soundtracks of 2016. As soon as I heard the music from the title screen I know I was in for a treat.”
The Hidden Levels

“Hue's soundtrack is incredibly soothing… it all makes for a meditative, almost hypnotic experience.”
Xbox Achievements

“The soundtrack is a haunting medley of instruments used to build tension, enforce sadness and reinforce the sense of adventure.”
Cubed3
